item.title: Re: Shop
item.content:encoded:
I say u have 24 hours after u buy something to sell it back for the full price u paid.

That's an exploit waiting to happen. You get the money for chakra armor, buy it, use it for those few missions you need the +1 range, then sell it back and you're out nothing. You could even do it on a mission by mission basis, if you want. If you need the range, buy the chakra armor. If not, sell it and get the desert robes. Or, if its a Nin mission and you have a bit more cash, pick up a ninja dog and and giant fan. You'd be able to min-max your bonuses for a fraction of the cost.
